manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT US Since being established in 2002, Perfect Stix LLC has offered the highest quality wooden products, using only A Grade white birch wood. Perfect Stix LLC has become The Premier Wood Supplier in the ice cream industry, concession industry, food service industry, medical industry, cosmetic industry, craft industry, paint industry and spa industry. We offer a wide variety of wooden products such as ice cream sticks, ice cream spoons, taster spoons, bowtie sticks, medical spoons, medical sticks, cotton tip applicators, tongue blades, tongue depressors, coffee stirrers, candy apple sticks, corn dog sticks, meat skewers, fruit skewers, lollipop dowels, cake dowels, craft sticks, paint paddles, fan handles, specialty sticks, spa sticks, eyebrow sticks, cuticle sticks, waxing sticks, popsicle sticks, corn dog sticks, and caramel sticks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for perfect napkins
reviews.reviewText: Got these when Costco was out and love that they are already folded and they are as good as some others...Not quite as soft, but they're good and absorbent enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these dinner napkins for Mother. It was delivered to her house and I had to tell her to check for her package. She was impressed with them. The light embossing was nice. They were big enough for our dinner on Monday. Softness and absorbency are always important. These are. I was a surprise for her as I knew she was running low. Great way to give a gift to a 98-year-old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong, soft, lint free - buy some!
reviews.reviewText: They are great napkins! Strong, soft and lint free. Not the cheapest- but you get what you pay for, they are a good product and value for the price. Thanks Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for dinner
reviews.reviewText: Napkins were great for a dinner party I hosted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for guests
reviews.reviewText: Ok for everyday but I wouldn't use for guests; they are thin and cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great napkin, great quality. I purchased these napkins because I couldn’t get any tissues anywhere. So I cut them in fours and stored in a plastic zip lock bag. Worked great and now I use them for the purpose intend. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good purchase
reviews.reviewText: It is soft, absorbs well, and it is the perfect size.

reviews.reviewTitle: el diseño no se nota es muy leve (relieve)
